description: Lydia is the second princess of the Elbing Kingdom. She currently resides on Uraniborg under the custody of Jouslain Tytania. Her primary recreation is gardening. Lydia volunteered to use herself as a hostage to appease the Landless Lord`s test of Elbing Kingdom`s loyalty and to save her country`s mine, it`s only source of income. She is 10 years old.
name: Lydia
